title: Gambling
body:
Not only do I dislike the way progression is handled now, especially considering I have a little amount of champions but I'm level 30, but can riot please stop being so greedy?
I opened 5 champion capsules so far, my issue is that, I currently have 3 Poppy shards, 2 Gangplank shards and 2 Maokai shards and I've gotten only cheap champion shards.
With so many champions that I don't own, was this really necessary?
I get you want people to pay more for your game, but this is ridiculous. Same with skins, I just get laughably cheap skins when opening chests and stuff...
This is just my plead for Riot to really start being considerate of their players, it won't cost you much to implement a system that doesn't give me the same shards I already have and to give me more expensive items, or atleast to balance it out. You know how this could've been avoided? If they didn't go for this stupid loot boxes trend that every game these days likes to go with.
Anyways does anyone agree with me or am I alone on this?

replies.body: Just keep complaining so Riot knows the majority of the community doesn't want this, otherwise they'll be like "ehh a few toxic crybabies they'll stop eventually".
